
# Function


## ```js isEdge ```


Detect if is edge

## Parameters

- **ua** (navigator.userAgent) String: The user agent on which to make the test



## Example (js)

```js
import isEdge from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/edge'
if (isEdge()) {
  // do something cool
}
```
